name: @alizharb/bootstrap-multiselect
description: Bootstrap-styled multiselect dropdown with search, tags, remote data and themes.
author: Ali Harb

scripts.build: npm run build:less && npm run build:scss && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: uglify-js src/js/azh-select.js -o dist/js/azh-select.min.js --compress --mangle && cp src/js/azh-select.js dist/js/azh-select.js
scripts.build:less: lessc src/less/azh-select.less dist/css/azh-select.css && cp src/less/azh-select.less dist/less/azh-select.less
scripts.build:scss: sass src/scss/azh-select.scss dist/css/azh-select.css --no-source-map && cp src/scss/azh-select.scss dist/scss/azh-select.scss
